doc:
Laura Leighton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Laura_Leighton 0 Laura Leighton (born July 24, 1968) is an American actress. She is best known for the role of Sydney Andrews on the television series Melrose Place (1993–97) and its remake (2009–10) and for Ashley Marin on ABC Family's series Pretty Little Liars (2010–2017). Laura_Leighton ( born July_24_,_1968 ) is an_American_actress . She is_best_known for the_role of Sydney_Andrews on the_television_series_Melrose_Place_(_1993 – 97_) and its_remake_(_2009 – 10_) and for Ashley_Marin on ABC_Family 's_series_Pretty_Little_Liars_(_2010 – 2017_) .
